data.title: About: Martin Smith (Royal Marines officer)
data.meta_description: Major General Martin Linn Smith, CB, MBE (born 30 July 1962) is a former senior Royal Marines officer who served as Commandant General Royal Marines from 2014 to 2016. He was previously commander of 3 Commando Brigade, and before that Commanding Officer of 30 Commando Information Exploitation Group and Deputy Commander of 3 Commando Brigade. Smith is currently a non-executive adviser of Texo Group.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

اللواء مارتن لين سميث (بالإنجليزية: Martin Linn Smith)‏ (ولد في 30 يوليو 1962) ضابط كبير في قوات المارينز الملكية والذي كان قائدا للقوات البحرية الملكية. كان سابقا قائد لواء الكوماندوز 3 وقبل ذلك القائد المسؤول عن مجموعة الكوماندوز لاستثمار المعلومات 30 ونائب قائد لواء الكوماندوز 3. (ar)

Major General Martin Linn Smith, CB, MBE (born 30 July 1962) is a former senior Royal Marines officer who served as Commandant General Royal Marines from 2014 to 2016. He was previously commander of 3 Commando Brigade, and before that Commanding Officer of 30 Commando Information Exploitation Group and Deputy Commander of 3 Commando Brigade. Smith is currently a non-executive adviser of Texo Group. (en)

rdfs:comment

اللواء مارتن لين سميث (بالإنجليزية: Martin Linn Smith)‏ (ولد في 30 يوليو 1962) ضابط كبير في قوات المارينز الملكية والذي كان قائدا للقوات البحرية الملكية. كان سابقا قائد لواء الكوماندوز 3 وقبل ذلك القائد المسؤول عن مجموعة الكوماندوز لاستثمار المعلومات 30 ونائب قائد لواء الكوماندوز 3. (ar)

Major General Martin Linn Smith, CB, MBE (born 30 July 1962) is a former senior Royal Marines officer who served as Commandant General Royal Marines from 2014 to 2016. He was previously commander of 3 Commando Brigade, and before that Commanding Officer of 30 Commando Information Exploitation Group and Deputy Commander of 3 Commando Brigade. Smith is currently a non-executive adviser of Texo Group. (en)
